nodes.name: Sanitize Filename1
nodes.notes: NEW: Sanitizes workflow name for GitHub-safe filename. Replaces / \ : * ? " < > | and spaces with underscores.

nodes.name: Sanitize Filename1
nodes.notes: NEW: Sanitizes workflow name for GitHub-safe filename. Replaces / \ : * ? " < > | and spaces with underscores.

nodes.name: Loop Over Items
nodes.notes: CRITICAL: Do NOT feed Execute Workflow back to input 0. splitInBatches auto-advances.

parameters.content:
## Backup to GitHub 
This workflow backs up all instance workflows to GitHub every 12 hours.

Files saved: `backups/YYYY/MM/ID.json`

Repo config in **Config** node (subworkflow).

Recursive design reduces memory usage.

nodes.name: Execute Workflow
nodes.notes: Calls this workflow recursively. NO loop-back connection — splitInBatches auto-advances.

parameters.text: =❌ Failed to backup {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.name }} (ID: {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.id }})

nodes.name: Failed Flows
nodes.notes: executeOnce prevents spam. Only first failure logged. Remove to log all.
